recipe.title: Gin Coco
instructions: Cut off the top of a fresh coconut and pour 4 ounces of the coconut water into an 8-ounce wineglass. Add the gin and ice cubes and stir.
Cut off the top of a fresh coconut and pour 4 ounces of the coconut water into an 8-ounce wineglass. Add the gin and ice cubes and stir.
